Text: Proposed Addition to Enfolio Firm General Terms Conditions Cc Debra as we discussed here is credit assurances language that Select proposes to add to the Firm GTC in addition to the other changes requested by Select on Credit Assurances If either party Party A has reasonable grounds to believe that the other partys Party B creditworthiness or performance under this Firm GTC has become unsatisfactory Party A will provide Party B with written notice requesting Performance Assurance in an amount determined by Party A in a commercially reasonable manner Upon receipt of such notice Party B shall have three Business Days to remedy the situation by providing such Performance Assurance to Party A In the event that Party B fails to provide such Performance Assurance or a guaranty or other credit assurance acceptable to Party A within three Business Days of receipt of notice then an Event of Default will be deemed to have occurred and Party A will be entitled to the remedies set forth in Section of this Firm GTC
